headline: Pekham Pal,  Nicholas Santangelo
abstract: The couple met in law school at Fordham.
lead_paragraph: Pekham Pal and Nicholas Gwilliam Santangelo were married Jan. 4 in Brooklyn. The Rev. Anthony D. Andreassi, a Roman Catholic priest, officiated at Brooklyn Winery, with Debanga Mookerjee, a Hindu priest, taking part.
